name: Unemployed
description:
They say you don't have any 'useful skills', but at least your clothes fit
well.

name: Tailor
description:
You've made and adjusted clothing for some of the biggest names in town.
Now, their undead bodies are trying to eat your brains. At least you'll be
able to keep your own clothing repaired.

name: Lab Technician
description:
It was your first day in the lab when the cataclysm hit. You were evacuated
with all the civilians, but at least you kept your lab gear.

name: Wannabe Mechanic
description:
Although you never got your driver's license, you've always loved cars.
You start with a wrench, a toolbelt, and some car-related reading material.

name: Scoundrel
description:
Your flexible outlook on law has ensured your survival, but now what?
You start with cargo pants, a hoodie, "sundries", 
and one additional level of melee.

name: Military Reserve
description:
Your a High school drop out with one goal in mind to join the military. 
Now you finally get in, and the whole world goes to shit.
You start out with some military gear.

name: Pre-Med Student
description:
You were a Pre-Med Student just starting out, 
You start with some bandages and some first aid skills.

name: Mafia Enforcer
description:
When it came to getting dirty, the boss knew you could be trusted to get
the job done, from performing hits to attitude adjustment, you were the best
now at the end of the world, you finally found your place in society.

name: Riot Police
description:
Assigned to a new district, to quell the recent rioting and looting, 
you quickly realized you were in over your head,
you start out with some riot gear.

name: Chain Smoker
description:
Everyone at work knew you as the person who always had a cigarette or two
in hand. Now, you're down to a single pack, and you hope you find more soon.
You start out with a strong nicotine addiction, and 10 cigarettes.

name: Used Car Salesman
description:
You were a cheat before the apocalypse, and your a cheat now
You start with speech, bartering and some driving skills.

name: Hobo
description:
Before the cataclysm everyone thought you were a crazy homeless drunk bastard
they called you names, spit on you, some even urinated on you! but whos 
laughing now, its the end of the world and your still cleaning their wallets.

name: Hunter
description:
Never one for guns, you took a liking to the bow,
hunting came naturally to you, just like your pa
and his pa before him.

name: Construction Worker
description:
They had you working on an underground facility during the cataclysm
while your family were all eaten by wolves. protected from the disaster
you emerged to a new world, a world you must survive at any means necessary
